name: Rot the Vote
description:
You are a senator, trying to keep your seat for as long as possible.  Age isn't an issue, because you are a zombie.  All you have to do is keep getting elected.

Losing seems inevitable, but they will have to pull your seat from your cold, dead hands.  And those cold dead hands can put up a real fight!

WASD - Move

Space - Interact, Close Windows

Made for Ludum Dare 50
